scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client,stencil -c auto --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run stencil"
scripts.db:migrate: npm exec tsx -- -e "import { runDbMigrate } from './server/db/index.ts'; runDbMigrate();"
scripts.db:cleanapply: npm exec tsx -- -e "import { runCleanApplyDb } from './server/db/index.ts'; runCleanApplyDb();"
scripts.cleanexit: concurrently -n server,client,stencil,fail -c auto --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run stencil" "node -e \"console.error('[fail] waiting 12s then exiting 1'); setTimeout(() => process.exit(1), 12000)\""
